```{r}

# IMBALANCE

ctrl <-
  trainControl(
  method = "cv",
  classProbs = TRUE,
  summaryFunction = prSummary,
  savePredictions = "all",
  index = cv_folds
  ) 

formula <- formulas_0_12$dettecumulee
rpart1_raw <- train(formula, 
                  data = sample_train, 
                  method = 'rpart',
                  metric = 'AUC',
                  trControl = ctrl,
                  tuneLength = 40,
                 na.action = "na.omit")

formula2 <- formulas_0_12$delais_bdf2
rpart2_raw <- train(formula2, 
                  data = sample_train, 
                  method = 'rpart',
                  metric = 'AUC',
                  trControl = ctrl,
                  tuneLength = 40,
                 na.action = "na.omit")

formula3 <- formulas_0_12$delais_bdf3
rpart3_raw <- train(formula3, 
                  data = sample_train, 
                  method = 'rpart',
                  metric = 'AUC',
                  trControl = ctrl,
                  tuneLength = 40,
                 na.action = "na.omit")

```
